alert.note: Alert for Greater Vancouver Area; Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 01 at 11:14PM PST until January 02 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in areas of dense fog. * WHERE...In Oregon, Lower Columbia. In Washington, I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County and Greater Vancouver Area. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...With temperatures near freezing, there will be spots of frost or ice on area roads. Poor visibility will make it harder than usual to see any slick spots ahead of you.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Pedestrians or cyclists should consider wearing bright or reflective clothing to improve the chances of being seen by others.

area.areaDesc: Greater Vancouver Area; Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County
